actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to extend the authority of the Administrator to make grants to States for the construction, remodeling, or renovation of State home facilities for furnishing hospital, domiciliary, and nursing home care for eligible veterans, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Extends the authority of the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to make grants for the consturction of State home facilities for furnishing nursing home care to veterans to fiscal year 1984.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to extend the authority of the Administrator to make grants to States for the construction, remodeling, or renovation of State home facilities for furnishing hospital, domiciliary, and nursing home care for eligible veterans, and for other purposes.
